title: The Cowboy Interview: Nipsey Hussle's Passing, Conspiracies & Rumors about His Death & More
description:
Cowboy sits down with Adam to share some much-needed wisdom, advice, life stories, his bond with Nipsey, his businesses, what he's working on, and more!!
-----
00:00 Intro
4:00 Getting his "Thundercat" name in prison, Cowboy was caught for robbery
6:29 Cowboy has been bangin for 32 years! + How beef perpetuates through generations, sometimes people don't even know the real root of the beef
14:12 Cowboy explains why he was drawn to Nipsey, his wisdom at a young age
31:14 - Nipsey getting his name from Black Dynamite movie 
34:15 - Working for Nipsey, Nipsey never judging him
1:02:57 - The last moments right before Nipsey passed
1:14:56 - The Victory Slap, perfecting the slap, Nipsey slapping the security guard 
1:33:41 - Having conversations with young people about banging, giving advice 
------
